title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
A chanchin hril chu ka duh 352
A chhuak malsawmna tam kalvariah 487
A hmangaihna fakin i zai ang 146
A hmangaihnaa ka chawlhin 45
A lalna ram chu rawn pelin 92
A lo kal leh dawn Lal Isua 505
A lo kalin a lo kalin 534
A lo thang Chhandamtu pian thu 98
A mak mang e van Lalber chuan 506
A mian riang maw Van mi a lo piang 114
A pui a pangte u 333
A ral mek lei ninawm hi 486
A saw raltiang tlangah kraws hlun tak chu a ding 203
Amah chu malsawmna hnar a ni 591
Amaha zara damin amah kan hloh 328
An hril Bethlehem daiah chuan zai mawi ri 126
An ruat Lal Imanuela 128
